title: Lux e bug
body:
They were using the Sorceress skin and their e had no ball or dotted border to it just the warped ground, really hard to see.

Also, why is there no clear border on Lux's e? The dotted line itself is sometimes hard to distinguish compared to the full circles of other abilities.

replies.body: I have Sorceress Lux ( and usually play her ), and this hasn't happened to me.

Sounds like a visual bug I'm getting atm. Cassiopeia's poison cloud is invisible to me, as long as it's an enemy Cass.

A lot of people are getting. I think the best course of action is to wait out until the next patch.
